catalog_info.title: Advanced Bosnian/Croatian/Serbian
catalog_info.description: Individualized study of the Bosnian/Croatian/Serbian language at the advanced level, conducted as a tutorial. Contact hours with language coach. Emphasis on literacy.   Not open to auditors. Language tutorials are offered by application only upon approval by the Director of the Languages Program and the Office of Undergraduate Education. See note on independent language tutorials on our website for details about the application process.
